009
010package Ch07_Morphological_Filters;
011
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.NeighborhoodType2D;
018import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
019import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryMorphologyOperator;
020import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryOutline;
021import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
022
023import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
024
025/**
026 * <p>
027 * ImageJ plugin implementing a binary 'outline' operation using either a 4- or 8-neighborhood. See Sec. 7.2.7 of [1]
028 * for additional details. This plugin works on 8-bit grayscale images only, the original image is modified. Zero-value
029 * pixels are considered background, all other pixels are foreground. Different to ImageJ's built-in morphological
030 * operators, this implementation does not incorporate the current display lookup-table (LUT).
031 * </p>
032 * <p>
033 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
034 * (2022).
035 * </p>
036 *
037 * @author WB
038 * @version 2022/01/24
039 */
040public class Outline_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
041        
042        public static NeighborhoodType2D Neigborhood = NeighborhoodType2D.N4;
043
044        private ImagePlus im;
045
046        /** Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open. */
047        public Outline_Demo() {
048                if (noCurrentImage()) {
049                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.RhinoSmallInv);
050                }
051        }
052        
053        @Override
054        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
055                this.im = im;
056                return DOES_8G;
057        }
058
059        @Override
060        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
061                if (!showDialog()) {
062                        return;
063                }
064                
065                BinaryMorphologyOperator outline = new BinaryOutline(Neigborhood);
066                outline.applyTo((ByteProcessor) ip);
067        }
068        
069        private boolean showDialog() {
070                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
071                if (im.isInvertedLut()) {
072                        gd.setInsets(0, 0, 0);
073                        gd.addMessage("NOTE: Image has inverted LUT (0 = white)!");
074                }
075                gd.addEnumChoice("Neighborhood type", Neigborhood);
076
077                gd.showDialog();
078                if (gd.wasCanceled())
079                        return false;
080                
081                Neigborhood = gd.getNextEnumChoice(NeighborhoodType2D.class);
082                return true;
083        }
084        
085}
086
